thread.title: Facebook goes after YouTube with video suggestions, floating screen, and dedicated feed
thread.title_full: Facebook goes after YouTube with video suggestions, floating screen, and dedicated feed - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Facebook goes after YouTube with video suggestions, floating screen, and dedicated feed
text: Facebook is testing out new video options on its social network aimed at helping you better “discover, watch, and share videos” that you might find interesting. Included in the updates are the general availability of suggested videos within Facebook’s iOS app, and an experiment to see the response to a dedicated place just for videos. […] »
